OOC: I agree. I never had the rules explained to me when I first joined a y=
ear ago. I was new to the Internet and didn't know how to act, and besides =
that I started off as just a bad RPGer. Kyle Stewart, you start off as a go=
od one, but with the same flaw as I originally had. Not knowing the rules. =
Of course, back then the rules page sucked, and it is nowhere near the gran=
d spectacle it is today. It's not very descriptive and informative. But bac=
k to my point, I moded alot without even noticing it, and did things very s=
imilar to you, Kyle Stewart (if that's what you like to be called). I once =
even busted into a base and played around inside in one post because I was =
bored, and didn't know what I did wrong until months later!...

  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Monday, July 16, 2001 1:45 PM
  Subject: Re: Kyle Stewart


  OOC: Cool=
 of Legendarynemasis. He's new, and it takes a while to get the
  rules, yo=
u above all should know that. Now you said that your a hot
  head, so you s=
hould know it's not smart to go off yelling at people.
  Kyle, don't worry,=
 everyone's moded once or twice, but we've just
  learned from our mistake.=
 Again, talk to the council. Also, welcome to
  the RPG :)

   

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
